event = {
	id = 90000301
	random = no
	country = UCS

	trigger = {
		control = { province = 207 data = UCS }
	}

	name = "Reichsprotektorat Bohmen und Mahren"
	desc = "The Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia was a protectorate of Nazi Germany established on 16 March 1939 following the German occupation of the Czech lands on 15 March 1939. Earlier, following the Munich Agreement of September 1938, Nazi Germany had incorporated the Czech Sudetenland territory as a Reichsgau (October 1938). The protectorate's population was majority ethnic Czech, while the Sudetenland was majority ethnic German."
	style = 2
	picture = "generalgovernment"

	date = { day = 1 month = february year = 1948 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = EVT_90000300_A 
		ai_chance = 100
		command = { type = 	dissent value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 90000302
	country = UCS
	random = no
	style = 2
	picture = "nwo\coventry_cathedral"

	trigger = {
        random = 10
		event = 90000301       
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 7
	deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1966 }

	name = "Prague Uprising"
	desc = "The Czech at Prague made their last attempt to reverse the events of history by rising up. The Czech Army has been fueled by Catholic resistance, as German anti-clerical policy were the most severe in the former Czech. Resistance leaders have ordered instructions on how troops could continue to pray and celebrate religious festivals."

	action = {
		name = "Crackdown!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 25 }

		command = { type = revolt which = 207 when = 0 } 
		command = { type = revolt which = 207 when = 0 } 
		command = { type = revolt which = 207 when = 0 } 
        command = { type = revolt which = 196 when = 0 } 
        command = { type = revolt which = 201 when = 0 } 

	}
}

event = {
	id = 90000303
	random = no
	country = GER
	save_date = yes

	decision = {
		event = 1000601 #Victory parade in Berlin 
		NOT = { 
            war = { country = GER country = SOV } 
            war = { country = GER country = USA } 
            war = { country = GER country = ENG } 
        }
		ispuppet = UCS		
		control = { province = 206 data = UCS } # Prague
	}
	
	decision_trigger = {
		manpower = 100
		ispuppet = UCS
		garrison = { country = -3 province = 207 size = 3 } #At least 3 units stationed in Prague
		garrison = { country = -3 province = 196 size = 2 } #At least 1 unit stationed in Brno
		garrison = { country = -3 province = 201 size = 1 } #At least 1 unit stationed in Ostrava				
	}

	#Only for AI
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
	    event = 1000601 #Victory parade in Berlin 
		manpower = 200
		ispuppet = UCS
    	region = { region = "Poland" country = -3 data = 1 }
	}

	
	name = "Reichsprotektorat Böhmen und Mähren question"
	desc = "Now that WW2 has concluded and our strategic goals in the east have been achieved, our attention can be focused elsewhere. One matter in particular requires your direct involvement, a lingering topic that calls out for a resolution and a definitive answer - the Czech Question.If we choose to Germanize the Czech state, it will take several years before it will be ready for incorporation into the Reich. The fate of Reichsprotektorat B�hmen und M�hren lies in your hands."
	style = 2
	picture = "ggpoland"
	decision_picture = "ggpolanddecision"

	date = { day = 0 month = may year = 1948 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "All of Bohemia and Moravia must become as German as the Rhineland"
		ai_chance = 70
		command = { type = wartime_ic_mod value = -2 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = -0.5 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -200 }
		command = { type = free_manpower value = -0.05 }
		command = { type = money value = -150 }
		command = { type = event which = 90000304 where = UCS when = 7 }
		command = { type = setflag which = GPOstBohemia } #Flag set for integration of Poland
	}
	
	action = {
		name = "Maintain the status quo."
		ai_chance = 10
		command = { type = relation which = UCS value = 10 }
	}
	
	action = {
		name = "Dissolve the Reichsprotektorat immediately"
		ai_chance = 30
		command = { type = inherit which = UCS value = 1 }
	}
}

		name = "Prague has risen! Grind them to dust!"

#### Germanization of Bohemia: Phase One
event = {
    id = 90000305
    random = no
    country = GER 
	save_date = yes
	
    name = "Germanization of Bohemia and Moravia: Phase One"
    desc = "The first steps of the Germanization of Bohemia have been completed. Leveraging existing German populations, we have elevated these natives to positions of power within their local governments, allowing them to grant special concessions and favor to Germanic settlers we have brought in from all over Europe. The marginalization of the existing Czech population will ensure that in 15 to 20 years, all of Czech will be on an irrevocable demographic shift. The next steps of Germanization are now underway"
    style = 2
    picture = "poland1"
	
	trigger = { 
		flag = GPOstBohemia
		ispuppet = UCS
		event = { id = 90000304 days = 120 } #Event Germanization of Bohemia activated 4 months ago, 120 days)
	} 
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

     action = {
		name = 1000643a		
		command = { type = addcore which = 199 where = UCS }
		command = { type = addcore which = 202 where = U44 }
		#Restore penalties from colonization decision		
		command = { type = wartime_ic_mod value = 1 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 0.5 }
		command = { type = free_manpower value = 0.02 }
	}
}

#### Germanization of Bohemia and Moravia: Phase Two
event = {
    id = 90000306
    random = no
    country = GER 
	save_date = yes
	
    name = "Germanization of Bohemia and Moravia: Phase Two"
    desc = "With the establishment of German schools all across the former territory of Bohemia and Moravia, we are educating select Czech children to identify as Germans. This process is carefully monitored by the Ostministerium to ensure that only the desired elements within the native Czech population will become part of our nation, and these efforts are already having the desired effect."
    style = 2
    picture = "poland2"
	
	trigger = { 
		flag = GPOstBohemia
		ispuppet = UCS	
		event = { id = 90000305 days = 120 } #Bohemia Phase One event activated 8 months ago - 120 days (total combined time 240 days) 
	} 
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

     action = {
		name = "Control the youth, control the future"		
		command = { type = addcore which = 198 where = UCS }
		command = { type = addcore which = 196 where = UCS }	
		#Restore penalties from colonization decision		
		command = { type = wartime_ic_mod value = 1 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 0.5 }
		command = { type = free_manpower value = 0.02 }
	}
}

    picture = "poland3"
	
	trigger = { 
		flag = GPOstBohemia
		ispuppet = UCS

	}

	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

		name = "Final Step, Prague"

		command = { type = addcore which = 206 where = UCS }
		command = { type = addcore which = 201 where = UCS }

#### Generalplan Ost - Incorporation of Bohemia
event = {
    id = 90000309
    random = no
    country = GER 
	
    name = "Germanization of Bohemia: Incorporation"
    desc = "The Reichskriegsflagge is hoisted over the rebuilt city of Prague in the new Reichsgau. "
    style = 2
    picture = "poland5"
	
	#Triggered by 1000647
	
     action = {
		name = 1000652a
		#Inherit GG Bohemia
		command = { type = inherit which = UCS when = 0 value = 1 }
		#Add cores on GG Bohemia
		command = { type = addcore which = 207 }	
		command = { type = addcore which = 199 }		
		command = { type = addcore which = 202 }	
		command = { type = addcore which = 198 }	
		command = { type = addcore which = 196 }		
		command = { type = addcore which = 206 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 201 }	
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 207 value = 2 }		
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 196 value = 1 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 199 value = 1 }		
        command = { type = waketeam which = 30 }  # Skoda
		#Restore penalties from colonization decision		
		command = { type = wartime_ic_mod value = 1 }
		command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 0.5 }
		command = { type = free_manpower value = 0.02 }
	}
}
